00048 /* Conversion table for VTKEY_NUM numerical code */
00049 extern uint8_t VTRIE_CODE[];

00141 class VTrie{
00142 public:

00147     ~VTrie(){
00148         if(data_){
00149             free(data_);
00150             data_ = 0;

00162     int insert( const char* key, VTrieNode* node ){
00163         //remaining length of the key
00164         size_t remainLen = strlen(key);
00165         ensureDataLength(remainLen);
00166 
00167         //empty string
00168         if(!remainLen){
00169             *reinterpret_cast<int*>(data_) = node->data;
00170             node->moreLong = *(data_ + VALUE_L) != 0;
00171             return 1;
00172         }
00173 
00174         if(remainLen > 0){
00175             *(data_ + VALUE_L) = 1;
00176         }
00177 
00178         vtptr_t* childPtr = reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(data_ + VALUE_L
00179                         + VTCHILDS_L + VTPTR_L * VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key]);
00180         if(!*childPtr){
00181             *childPtr = (size_t)(endPtr_ - data_);
00182             //if(VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key] == 254){
00183             //    cout<<"Create "<<(uint8_t*)childPtr - data_ <<endl;
00184             //}
00185             appendLeafNode(key, node);
00186             return 1;
00187         }
00188 
00189         uint8_t* dataPtr = data_ + *childPtr;
00190 
00191         while(remainLen){
00192             uint8_t* nodeStart = dataPtr;
00193             uint8_t samePathLen = *dataPtr++;
00194             while(samePathLen){
00195                 if((uint8_t)*key == *dataPtr){
00196                     //the end of the key
00197                     if(remainLen == 1){
00198                         *reinterpret_cast<int*>(dataPtr+1) = node->data;
00199                         node->moreLong = samePathLen > 1 || *(dataPtr+VTENTRY_L);
00200                         return 1;
00201                     }
00202                 }else{
00203                     vector<int> keyVec;
00204                     keyVec.push_back(VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key]);
00205                     keyVec.push_back(VTRIE_CODE[*dataPtr]);
00206                     uint16_t minMod = 1 + getModMinSize(keyVec);
00207 
00208                     node->moreLong = false;
00209                     //compute the current status
00210                     uint8_t entryNum = (uint8_t)((dataPtr - nodeStart - VTSAMEPS_L) / VTENTRY_L);
00211                     size_t copyLen = dataPtr - nodeStart;
00212                     uint8_t diffSamePathLen = *nodeStart - entryNum;
00213                     //compute wasted bytes, -1 is the same path status byte
00214                     wastedBytes_ += copyLen - 1;
00215 
00216                     uint8_t* nStart = endPtr_;
00217                     *childPtr = (vtptr_t)(nStart - data_);
00218                     //copy the same begining
00219                     memcpy(nStart, nodeStart, copyLen);
00220                     //new same path status byte
00221                     *nStart = entryNum;
00222                     nStart += copyLen;
00223                     //children status byte
00224                     *nStart++ = (uint8_t)(minMod-1);
00225                     endPtr_ = nStart + minMod * VTPTR_L;
00226                     //set the original node (be compared)
00227                     *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(nStart + VTRIE_CODE[*dataPtr] % minMod * VTPTR_L)
00228                             = (vtptr_t)(dataPtr - data_ - VTSAMEPS_L);
00229                     *(dataPtr - 1) = diffSamePathLen;
00230 
00231                     //different node occur, separate the node
00232                     dataPtr = endPtr_;
00233                     *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(nStart + VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key] %
00234                             minMod* VTPTR_L) = (vtptr_t)(dataPtr - data_);
00235                     //append new leaf node
00236                     appendLeafNode(key, node);
00237                     return 1;
00238                 }
00239 
00240                 dataPtr += VTENTRY_L;
00241                 --samePathLen;
00242                 ++key;
00243                 --remainLen;
00244             } //end while(samePathLen > 0)
00245 
00246             if(*dataPtr){
00247                 //move to next node
00248                 vtptr_t* tChildPtr = reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(dataPtr + VTCHILDS_L
00249                     + VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key] % (1+*dataPtr) * VTPTR_L);
00250 
00251                 //not exists, append new leaf node
00252                 if(!*tChildPtr){
00253                     *tChildPtr = (vtptr_t)(endPtr_ - data_);
00254                     appendLeafNode(key, node);
00255                     return 1;
00256                 }
00257                 //maybe have to rebuild this node
00258                 if((uint8_t)*key != *(data_ + *tChildPtr + VTSAMEPS_L)){
00259                     *childPtr = resolveConfilct(nodeStart, key, node);
00260                     return 1;
00261                 }else{
00262                     childPtr = tChildPtr;
00263                 }
00264 
00265                 dataPtr = data_ + *childPtr;
00266             }
00267             //this node without children
00268             else{
00269                 //at the end of the data_
00270                 if((dataPtr+1) == endPtr_){
00271                     *nodeStart = *nodeStart + remainLen;
00272                     copyLeafNodeValue(dataPtr, key, node);
00273                     return 1;
00274                 }
00275 
00276                //ignore the children status byte
00277                 size_t copyLen = (size_t)(dataPtr - nodeStart);
00278                 //this section would be abandoned
00279                 wastedBytes_ += copyLen + VTCHILDS_L;
00280                 dataPtr = endPtr_;
00281                 *childPtr = (vtptr_t)(dataPtr - data_);
00282                 //cout<<"addEnd d:"<<(dataPtr-data_)<<",s:"<<(nodeStart-data_)<<",l:"<<copyLen<<endl;
00283                 memcpy(dataPtr, nodeStart, copyLen);
00284 
00285                 //update the length of the same path
00286                 *dataPtr = *dataPtr+ remainLen;
00287                 dataPtr += copyLen;
00288                 copyLeafNodeValue(dataPtr, key, node);
00289                 return 1;
00290             }
00291         } //end while(remainLen)
00292         return 0;
00293     }
00294 
00299     void optimize(){
00300        if(!wastedBytes_)
00301             return;
00302         curDataSize_ -= wastedBytes_;
00303         uint8_t* nData = (uint8_t*)malloc(curDataSize_);
00304         memset(nData, 0x0, curDataSize_);
00305         memcpy(nData, data_, VALUE_L + VTCHILDS_L);
00306         vtptr_t* nChild = (vtptr_t*)(nData + VALUE_L + VTCHILDS_L);
00307         vtptr_t* oChild = (vtptr_t*)(data_ + VALUE_L + VTCHILDS_L);
00308         uint8_t* childNData = (uint8_t*)nChild + VTKEY_NUM * VTPTR_L;
00309         for(int i=0; i<VTKEY_NUM; ++i){
00310             //have child
00311             if(*oChild){
00312                 //set new child
00313                 *nChild = (vtptr_t)(childNData - nData);
00314                 childNData = optimize(childNData, data_+*oChild, nData, data_);
00315             }
00316             ++nChild;
00317             ++oChild;
00318         }
00319 
00320         free(data_);
00321         data_ = nData;
00322         endPtr_ = childNData;
00323         wastedBytes_ = 0;
00324     }
00325 
00333     int search( const char* key, VTrieNode* node){
00334         if(!data_) return 0;
00335         size_t remainLen = strlen(key);
00336 
00337         //empty string
00338         if(!remainLen){
00339             node->data = *reinterpret_cast<int*>(data_);
00340             node->moreLong = *(data_ + VALUE_L) != 0;
00341             return node->data != 0;
00342         }
00343 
00344         //find the find level
00345         vtptr_t childOffset = *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(data_ + VALUE_L
00346                         + VTCHILDS_L + VTPTR_L * VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key]);
00347         if(!childOffset){
00348             node->moreLong = false;
00349             node->data = 0;
00350             return 0;
00351         }
00352 
00353         //set the starting second level node
00354         uint8_t* dataPtr = data_ + childOffset;
00355 
00356         while( remainLen){
00357             uint8_t samePathLen = *dataPtr++;
00358             //should be ending here
00359             if(remainLen <= samePathLen){
00360                 samePathLen -= remainLen;
00361                 for(; remainLen; --remainLen){
00362                     //not equals, moreLong default is false
00363                     if((uint8_t)*key != *dataPtr){
00364                         node->moreLong = false;
00365                         node->data = 0;
00366                         return 0;
00367                     }
00368                     dataPtr += VTENTRY_L;
00369                     ++key;
00370                 }
00371                 //still have more content in the samePath or have children
00372                 node->moreLong = samePathLen > 0 || *dataPtr;
00373                 //rollback to the value
00374                 dataPtr -= VALUE_L;
00375                 break;
00376             }else{
00377                 //upper size in the current path
00378                 size_t lower = remainLen - samePathLen;
00379                 for(; remainLen > lower; --remainLen){
00380                     //not equals, moreLong default is false
00381                     if((uint8_t)*key != *dataPtr){
00382                         node->moreLong = false;
00383                         node->data = 0;
00384                         return 0;
00385                     }
00386                     dataPtr += VTENTRY_L;
00387                     ++key;
00388                 }
00389 
00390                 //there is not children
00391                 if(!*dataPtr){
00392                     node->moreLong = false;
00393                     node->data = 0;
00394                     return 0;
00395                 }
00396                 childOffset = *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(dataPtr + VTCHILDS_L
00397                         + VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key] % (1 + *dataPtr) * VTPTR_L);
00398                 //no children slot
00399                 if(!childOffset){
00400                     node->moreLong = false;
00401                     node->data = 0;
00402                     return 0;
00403                 }
00404                 dataPtr = data_ + childOffset;
00405             } //end else
00406         } //end while( remain )
00407 
00408         node->data = *reinterpret_cast<int*>(dataPtr);
00409         return node->data != 0;
00410     }
00411 
00420     int find( char ch, VTrieNode* node ){
00421         //not has more length any more
00422         if(!node->moreLong){
00423             node->data = 0;
00424             return 0;
00425         }
00426         //the header of VTrieNode
00427         if(!node->offset){
00428             vtptr_t firstOffset = *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(data_ + VALUE_L +
00429                     VTCHILDS_L + VTPTR_L * VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)ch]);
00430             //no child in the second level
00431             if(!firstOffset){
00432                 node->data = 0;
00433                 node->moreLong = false;
00434                 return 0;
00435             }
00436             node->offset = firstOffset + 1;
00437             node->state = *(data_ + firstOffset);
00438             assert(node->state);
00439         }
00440 
00441         uint8_t* dataPtr = data_ + node->offset;
00442 
00443         //the child status byte
00444         if(!node->state){
00445             if(!*dataPtr){
00446                 node->data = 0;
00447                 node->moreLong = false;
00448                 return 0;
00449             }
00450             vtptr_t childOffset = *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(dataPtr + VTCHILDS_L +
00451                     VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)ch] % (1 + *dataPtr) * VTPTR_L);
00452             //not exist children slot
00453             if(!childOffset){
00454                 node->data = 0;
00455                 node->moreLong = false;
00456                 return 0;
00457             }
00458             node->offset = childOffset + 1;
00459             node->state = *(data_ + childOffset);
00460             assert(node->state);
00461             dataPtr = data_ + node->offset;
00462         }
00463 
00464         if((uint8_t)ch == *dataPtr){
00465             node->data = *reinterpret_cast<int*>(dataPtr+1);
00466         }else{
00467             node->data = 0;
00468             node->moreLong = false;
00469             return 0;
00470         }
00471         --node->state;
00472         node->offset += VTENTRY_L;
00473         node->moreLong = node->state || *(dataPtr + VTENTRY_L);
00474         return node->data != 0;
00475 
00476     }
00477 
00481     size_t size(){
00482         return curDataSize_ + sizeof(VTrie);
00483     }

00485 private:
00487     void init(){
00488         assert(sizeof(int) == VALUE_L);
00489         assert(sizeof(vtptr_t) == VTPTR_L);
00490 
00491         data_ = 0;
00492         endPtr_ = 0;
00493         wastedBytes_ = 0;
00494         curDataSize_ = 0;
00495     }
00496 
00500     void ensureDataLength(size_t keyLen){
00501         //has wasted too much space
00502         if(wastedBytes_ && wastedBytes_ > curDataSize_ * 0.3){
00503             optimize();
00504         }
00505 
00506         size_t remain = 0;
00507         size_t usedLen = 0;
00508         if( curDataSize_ > 0 ){
00509             usedLen = (size_t)(endPtr_ - data_);
00510             remain = curDataSize_ - usedLen;
00511         }
00512 
00513         if( remain > MIN_REMAIN )
00514             return;
00515 
00516         curDataSize_ += INCRE_SIZE;
00517         uint8_t* nData = (uint8_t*)malloc(curDataSize_);
00518         if(data_){
00519             memcpy(nData, data_, usedLen);
00520             //free the original data
00521             free(data_);
00522         }
00523 
00524         endPtr_ = nData + usedLen;
00525 
00526         memset(endPtr_, 0x0, curDataSize_ - usedLen);
00527         if(usedLen == 0){
00528             endPtr_ = nData + VALUE_L + VTCHILDS_L + VTKEY_NUM * VTPTR_L;
00529         }
00530         data_ = nData;
00531     }
00532 
00536     uint8_t* optimize(uint8_t* nData, uint8_t* oData, uint8_t* nRoot, uint8_t* oRoot){
00537         uint8_t samePathLen = *oData;
00538         uint8_t* dataPtr = oData + VTSAMEPS_L + VTENTRY_L * samePathLen;
00539         memcpy(nData, oData, dataPtr - oData + VTCHILDS_L);
00540 
00541         nData += dataPtr - oData + VTCHILDS_L;
00542 
00543         //cout<<(dataPtr-oRoot)<<":"<<(int)*dataPtr<<","<<(int)samePathLen<<endl;
00544         //has no child
00545         if(!*dataPtr){
00546             return nData;
00547         }
00548         int minMod = 1 + *dataPtr;
00549 
00550         vtptr_t* nChild = (vtptr_t*)nData;
00551         vtptr_t* oChild = (vtptr_t*)(dataPtr + 1);
00552         uint8_t* childNData = nData + minMod * VTPTR_L;
00553         for(int i=0; i<minMod; ++i){
00554             //have child
00555             if(*oChild){
00556                 //set new child
00557                 *nChild = (vtptr_t)(childNData - nRoot);
00558                 childNData = optimize(childNData, oRoot+*oChild, nRoot, oRoot);
00559             }
00560             ++nChild;
00561             ++oChild;
00562         }
00563         return childNData;
00564     }
00565 
00569     inline void appendLeafNode(const char* key, VTrieNode* node){
00570         *endPtr_ = (uint8_t)strlen(key);
00571         copyLeafNodeValue(endPtr_ + 1, key, node);
00572     }
00573 
00578     inline void copyLeafNodeValue(uint8_t* dataPtr, const char* key, VTrieNode* node){
00579         while(*key){
00580             *dataPtr = (uint8_t)*key++;
00581             dataPtr += VTENTRY_L;
00582         }
00583         *reinterpret_cast<int*>(dataPtr-VALUE_L) = node->data;
00584         //with no child status
00585         *dataPtr++ = 0;
00586         node->moreLong = false;
00587 
00588         endPtr_ = dataPtr;
00589     }
00590 
00594     inline uint8_t getModMinSize(const vector<int>& vec){
00595         int len = (int)vec.size();
00596         if(len == 0)
00597             return 0;
00598 
00599         int max = vec[0]; //max value in vector add 1
00600         for(int i=1;i<len;++i){
00601             if(vec[i] > max)
00602                 max = vec[i];
00603         }
00604         ++max;
00605         bool tmpA[max];
00606         int k;
00607 
00608         for(int i=len;i<max; ++i){
00609             //reset again
00610             memset(tmpA, 0x0, sizeof(tmpA));
00611             for(k=0; k<len; ++k){
00612                 int mod = vec[k] % i;
00613                 if(tmpA[mod]) //have been set
00614                     break;
00615                 tmpA[mod] = 1;
00616             }
00617             if(k == len){
00618                 return (uint8_t)(i-1);
00619             }
00620         }
00621         return (uint8_t)(max-1);
00622     }
00623 
00624     inline vtptr_t resolveConfilct(uint8_t* nodeStart, const char* key, VTrieNode* node){
00625         uint8_t* modByte = nodeStart + VTSAMEPS_L + *nodeStart * VTENTRY_L;
00626         size_t copyLen = (size_t)(modByte - nodeStart);
00627         int minMod = 1 + *modByte;
00628         //update wasted bytes
00629         wastedBytes_ += copyLen + VTCHILDS_L + minMod * VTENTRY_L;
00630 
00631         vector<int> keyVec;
00632         //append the new char first
00633         keyVec.push_back(VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key]);
00634 
00635         vtptr_t* childPtr = (vtptr_t*)(modByte+1);
00636 
00637         for(int i=0; i<minMod; ++i){
00638             if(*childPtr){
00639                 keyVec.push_back(VTRIE_CODE[*(data_ + *childPtr + VTSAMEPS_L)]);
00640             }
00641             ++childPtr;
00642         }
00643 
00644         uint16_t nMinMod = 1 + getModMinSize(keyVec);
00645         if(minMod == nMinMod){
00646             cout<<"same mod "<<minMod<<endl;
00647             for(size_t i=0; i<keyVec.size(); ++i){
00648                 cout<<keyVec[i]<<",";
00649             }
00650             cout<<endl;
00651         }
00652         assert(minMod != nMinMod);
00653 
00654         uint8_t* dataPtr = endPtr_;
00655         vtptr_t ret = (size_t)(dataPtr - data_);
00656         memcpy(dataPtr, nodeStart, copyLen);
00657 
00658         dataPtr += copyLen;
00659 
00660         *dataPtr++ = (uint8_t)(nMinMod - 1);
00661 
00662         endPtr_ = dataPtr + nMinMod * VTENTRY_L;
00663 
00664         childPtr = (vtptr_t*)(modByte+1);
00665         for(int i=0; i<minMod; ++i){
00666             if(*childPtr){
00667                 vtptr_t code = VTRIE_CODE[*(data_ + *childPtr + VTSAMEPS_L)] % nMinMod * VTPTR_L;
00668                 *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(dataPtr + code) = *childPtr;
00669             }
00670             ++childPtr;
00671         }
00672 
00673         vtptr_t code = VTRIE_CODE[(unsigned char)*key] % nMinMod * VTPTR_L;
00674         *reinterpret_cast<vtptr_t*>(dataPtr + code) = (vtptr_t)(endPtr_ - data_);
00675         appendLeafNode(key, node);
00676         return ret;
00677     }
00678 
00679     void printBytes(uint8_t* start, size_t num){
00680         if(start - data_ + num > curDataSize_){
00681             num = curDataSize_ - (start - data_);
00682         }
00683         for(size_t i=0; i<num; ++i){
00684             cout<<(int)*start++<<",";
00685         }
00686         cout<<endl;
00687     }

00692 
00694     uint8_t* endPtr_;
00695 
00697     size_t wastedBytes_;
00698 
00700     size_t curDataSize_;
00701 };
